synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Designed to behave as a buffer with phenol group as a weak acid and amino and triazine groups as weak bases.

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Evacuation under high vacuum at 150 88C for 12 h
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Features copper paddlewheel cluster, [Cu24(BDPO)12(H2O)12]·30 DMF·14 H2O. Exhibits excellent water and acidic/alkaline stability.
